timeline.message: Migrate changes to NB11
Merge branch 'master-nb11' into Layers_view-NB11
Merge branch 'master-nb11' into Layers_view-NB11

Add remove functionality to layers

rename layers view module
Refactor and increase code efficiency

Fix bug with transactions and query search

now checks if vertex or transaction

Change query split

 - Create plugin for setting of query list
Remove accidental addition

:art: updated layers view package names to match convention
:art: updated layers view module source to java 11
:art: removed unused dependencies from layers view module
:art: added icon for layers view
:art: updated layers view attributes to make them more interpretable
:art: moved LayerAction enum to its own class to avoid access warnings
:art: updated LayersViewPane with an add layer button
:art: added finalsand other minor code improvements

Merge pull request #388 from cygnus-x-1/Layers_view-NB11

layers-view-improvements
Merge branch 'master' into Layers_view-NB11
Fix refactoring issue
Merge branch 'Layers_view-NB11' of https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation into Layers_view-NB11

:art: added layer limit to add layers button
:art: cleaned up StoreGraph
Merge branch 'master' into Layers_view-NB11
:art: fixed an import

Merge pull request #399 from cygnus-x-1/Layers_view-NB11

layers-view-nb11

Fix refactoring issue and change split terms

Split now occurs on ( or ) and can be escaped with /
Merge branch 'master' into Layers_view-NB11

:art: layers-view-improvements (#429)

* :art: improved layout and style for layersviewpane
* :art: reindexed views to provide space for layers view
* :art: moved caspian css to javafx util package
* :bug: Fixed a bug casting to the correct object.

Co-authored-by: arcturus2 <39325530+arcturus2@users.noreply.github.com>

replies.bodyText: Is that the correct way to attribute code or should it go into Attributions?
replies.author: aldebaran30701

replies.bodyText: That is a good point. I think it would be nice to mention something in ATTRIBUTIONS.md too. This helps keep it all consolidated.
replies.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText:
Would this be suitable?
our file name, lisence and link to the licence.

I can push this up as soon as you give the go ahead. Then I'm good for it to be merged in. @arcturus2
